column1: '''Mirrosoft Ltd.''' was a software and video games company responsible for developing ''[[Riders of Rohan (video game)
column2: Riders of Rohan]]''.<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/riders.html Riders of Rohan] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 4 January 2011)</ref> They were bought by [[wikipedia:Acclaim Entertainment
